if(NOT IREE_INPUT_STABLEHLO AND NOT IREE_HOST_BIN_DIR)
  return()
endif()

    check_stablehlo_regression_llvm-cpu

    "dynamic_add.mlir"

    "local-task"

    "--iree-llvmcpu-target-cpu=generic"
)
